amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike all after the resolving clause and insert a complete new text entitled "Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for FY 2018" proposed by the Republican Study Committee. Amendment can be found on page H7846 of the Congressional Record dated October 5, 2017.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-339 and offered as the Republican Study Committeee proposal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 281 (Roll no. 555).

action.text: Amendment (A003) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. McClintock.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 281 (Roll no. 555).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. McClintock.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
